Я написал в поддержку объяснил ситуацию но мне ответили не важно кто играл на аккаунтеы. Пиз@@@

This has been my favourite game ever since i was like 7 years old... started playing cs 1.6 and then went straight to this one... i can never seem to stop playing this and i do recommend this game but the only reason as to why ive no pressed the recommend button is because ever since this game became free, a lot of people started playing this game and a lot more hackers did also.... Valve, you seriously need to do something about the cheaters... ive watched replays of games where ive had to play against cheaters, reported them both im game and on steam and i bet nothing is even happening... i feel like you guys have put in a report system that does nothing because the cheaters havent stopped cheating.... i dont understand what you guys are trying to achieve anymore.... CS:GO is the worlds N1 competitive FPS game, your player base is massive... please do all of us a favour and out a price on this game so that 9 year olds would stop downloading this game along with cheats to make them believe that theyre actually good instead of work towards becoming better... thats all.
